p: The authors thank all personnel from Health Surveillance Systems who coordinated surveillance and helped with data collection and assembly. The authors thank the Director of the Central Health Laboratory of Salvador Bahia, Arabela Leal E Silva de Mello and the Dr. Melissa Barreto Falcão for the clinical evaluation. The authors also thank the Coordinators of each Health Surveillance Unit (from the municipalities of Feira de Santana, Salvador, Camaçari, Coração de Maria, Conceição do Jacuipe, Itamarajú, Ipecaetá and Coaraci).
